scripts.memcheck: npm run pretest && npm run build:debug && valgrind --tool=memcheck --leak-check=full --show-leak-kinds=all --track-origins=yes --log-file=guides/valgrind_memcheck.txt node --napi-modules --expose-gc ./test/test_binding.debug.js
scripts.massif: npm run pretest && npm run build:debug && valgrind --tool=massif --massif-out-file=guides/valgrind_massif.txt node --napi-modules --expose-gc ./test/test_binding.debug.js
